name: Bork to Be Wild
description: Bork to Be Wild was made during a 48 hour Game Jam at Otto-von-Guericke University, Magdeburg. The theme was "Back to The Roots" and we decided to make a game where you literally eat your way back to the roots. It's a fun little arcade style game reminiscent of old browser games that you played with multiple people and only one keyboard.
